programme.desc: In the Ming Dynasty during the reign of Emperor Jiajing, Japanese pirates regularly threaten the eastern coast of the Chinese empire. In 1557, the province of Cengang gets taken by pirates, and Ming troops led by Yu (Sammo Hung) are unable to breach the pirate stronghold after months of battle. Unbeknownst to the Ming, the unruly pirates are working with elite samurai forces, led by seasoned warrior Kumazawa (Kurata Yasuaki), that are looking to expand territory. (PG13-暴力镜头).

programme.title: 真爱无敌 Love Me, Love Me Not - EP 0001 & 0002
国记交意所 It's A Small World - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) "It's A Small World" is a show in a classroom setting where the participants are Mandarin speaking foreigners who act as students. They exchange their opinions and experiences that they had in different countries. They discuss on topics such as fashion, art and music, geography, policies, traditional practices, social phenomenons and such to the best of their Mandarin knowledge. Often the participants mispronounce Mandarin words, to the joy and laughter of others! (重)主持人李国煌担任"讲师"，带领各国"学生"趣谈新加坡独特语言与文化。他们也会研究各国人民如何看待某些课题。.

programme.title: 真命小和尚 The Royal Monk - EP 0019 & 0020
programme.desc: (R) The story revolves around a lively eight-year-old monk named Happy. He started his life at Shaolin Temple, his wit and lively personality made him the abbot's favourite. His only desire is to reunite with his mother. (重)(大结局).

programme.title: 名人。心货 Celeb's Curated Collections - EP 12
programme.desc: (R) Priscelia Chan donates her valuable handmade artwork which she has kept for 16 years. Renowned fashion designer Max Tan donates motivational books which have inspired him and clothes that he designed. Annie donates her precious wine glasses. Cheryl Wee donates very practical items. It's the thought that counts that is of more importance. (重)曾诗梅将收了16年的手工艺品割爱；扬名国际的服装设计师Max捐出曾经启发他心灵的励志书籍，还有他自己品牌的服装；服装师Annie把最心爱的水晶酒杯割舍；黄馨慧虽是富二代，但不盲从名牌，捐的非常实在。有心的给予，远远胜于价值。.

programme.title: 荷兰村 Holland V - EP 0077 & 0078
programme.desc: (R) We never knew that the best of nasi lemak and the quirkiest folks could be found in Holland V... Recapture the aroma with the encore telecast. (重)新传媒首部超过百集的电视剧，也是去年红星大奖大赢家，囊括最佳男女主角、男女配角和最高收视率电视剧。故事围绕在荷兰村卖椰浆饭的莫家、开洗衣店的林家、饮食集团恶霸杨家。他们在荷兰村成长、做生意、谈恋爱。碰到各种各样的问题，有开心、有失意、有阻难，但在亲情的力量中，一切都引刃而解。.

programme.title: 摩尔庄园 Mole's World - EP 0023 & 0024
programme.desc: (R) This is the story of ordinary little Moer - Mo Lele who uses his super power to transform into LeLe Knight to fight against the evil witch Kula and protect the manor. (重)摩尔庄园动画片讲述了一个普通的小摩尔——摩乐乐利用自己的超能力变身乐乐侠，对抗邪恶巫师库拉，保护庄园的故事。.

programme.title: 哆啦A梦 New Doraemon - EP 191
programme.desc: This animation series centres on a robotic cat from the future, Doraemon. With its various magical gadgets, Doraemon helps its master solve all kinds of problems. 在这系列卡通动画里，小朋友们将看到哆啦A梦 - 这只来自未来世界的机器猫，如何应用它的法宝，协助其主人大雄解决生活上的各种难题。.

programme.title: 石器时代: 寻找传说中的宠物 Stoneage: The Legendary Pet S1 - EP 0009, 0010, 0011 & 0012
programme.desc: A passionate dreamer Woody, along with a baby pet dinosaur Moga, sets path to become the best pet trainer. Join Woody's journey as the action and comedy will keep your futuristic stone-age era a worthwhile adventure! 讲述梦想成为驯兽师的小男孩Woody与小宠物恐龙摩加（Moga）如何成为最佳宠物教练的冒险道路。.

programme.title: 搜密.打卡.小红点 Little Red Dot Detectives - EP 3
星期二特写: 寻找新边际 Tuesday Report - The New Periphery - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) Singapore, a little red dot, devoid of natural resources and sparse land, faces the difficulty of sustaining survival. However, we have come so far on this journey of nation-building. Through the ceaseless searching of survival methods, we have found ourselves economic opportunities, city building and management skills, and also food sources. (重)新加坡是一个弹丸小国，天然资源匮乏。这些年来新加坡之所以能立足于世界的大舞台，并且展露光芒，正因为新加坡多年来不断的掌握先机，不断的寻找新边际； 无论是开拓更多新食源、或是输出城市建设、改造与管理经验，新加坡都不遗余力，勇往直前。.

programme.title: 陪你走千里 With You, A 1000 Miles - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) "With You, A 1000 miles" is a cross platform doc-reality format program that will audition, select and track the 1000 miles journey of a pair of father-son or husband-wife or brother-sister or grandparent-grandchildren or close friends, as they undertake the life transforming road trip of their lives. (重)《陪你走千里》是个写实记录节目。节目会以面试的方式选取一对情侣／父子／夫妻／姐弟／祖孙，并跟随他们参与一场长达千里，改变人生的旅程。.

programme.title: 我在你左右 With You - EP 0013 & 0014
programme.desc: (R) Wen-an gets involved in a minor accident with Zhang Yang and tries to stop the latter from leaving to no avail. Zhang Yang gets killed in another accident almost immediately. Wen-an becomes his only "bridge". (重)主演：彭耀顺饰周文安；陈汉玮饰张扬；瑞恩饰叶思琪；潘淑钦饰赵美香；黄炯耀饰张伟；鹤天赐饰张焕；陈澍城饰张永盛。.

programme.title: 小店铺 Little Shops - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) This week, Belinda finds herself in Bugis Albert Centre. Our protagonist Mr Wang is a 71-year-old man. He was a tailor like many in the old days in Singapore but he also unique compare to others. He showed great perseverance in the face of difficulty because he was born a deaf-mute. (重)本周，节目主持人来到武吉士雅柏中心。71岁的王钦祥是一名独一无二的裁缝。他天生聋哑，但坚强的他从不轻易放弃。机会不会从天而降，必须靠努力去争取，王先生热爱并认真对待他的工作，也因此他得到了每一位顾客的喜爱。但他每天工作超过12小时，工作环境质量成为了一件让人担心的问题。.

The Ministers will also respond to views expressed by the public in street interviews. Helmed by Radio Presenter Lim Leng Kee and News and Current Affairs presenter Soh Bee Lan, "A Conversation with Minster" will make its debut this Saturday on TV and is also available on radio and our digital platforms. (重)新系列《空中访民情》，邀请政府部门的部长、高级政务部长、高级政务次长，以及嘉宾们共聚新传媒园区，以轻松的聊天方式讨论教育、就业、健康、家庭和经济等课题。部长也会在节目中，解答民众通过街头访问提出的反馈。这系列共有六集，由电台广播员林灵芝和时事节目主持人苏美兰主持，并将通过多平台呈献给观众、听众和网民。.

programme.title: 哪吒 The Legends Of Ne Zha - EP 0009 & 0010
双子星 The Ultimatum - EP 0021 & 0022

Both Wen Yu and Song Nian's wife gave birth to daughters in the same hospital. As fate will have it, the hospital made a mistake and swapped the babies. Because Wen Yu's daughter was diagnosed with congenital heart disease, she kept silent about the mistake so that her daughter can receive the best medical care with Song Nian's wealth. (重)三十多年前，凤凰集团老板叶松年强暴了原已怀孕的郑文玉，满心怨恨的文玉遂故意让自己和对方二姨太同时出世的女儿－叶予晨、方宋乔身份对调。宋乔在文玉泄恨打骂之下，度过悲苦的童年；予晨长大后则在凤凰集团身居要职。.

Kongli asks Baida, who is a hopeless gambler, to impersonate Tietong so as to keep Kaixin under his control. Kaixin falls for the sham and believes that Tietong has reincarnated. (重)二十年后，圆慧的胞弟紫薇真人高居当朝国师。开心小和尚从少林寺调到乌龙寺做主持，使该寺戒律院主管铁空又气又爱，更是搞得县衙门老爷、师爷头痛不已。街头混混百搭阴差阳错成了开心的铁桶师叔，麻烦接踵而来。.

(重)在中新广州知识城的规划建设中，新加坡人将管理经验带到广州，让这座城市平添了不少新加坡特色。专利审查中心已落户知识城，新加坡华中国际学校也将入驻，知识城未来将进一步与国际接轨。知识城快速发展改变周遭景观和生活面貌，对当地人产生什么影响？他们对知识城的未来有什么期许？.

programme.desc: Hugo speaks to Xin Xin in private to convince her to not miss the opportunities of being able to spend time with Li E, if she does not want to regret it in the future. Xin Xin understands that Hugo once took care of his mother who suffered from Dementia, and thus feels closer with Hugo suddenly. Mei Fang justifies herself sternly by listing out all of Xin Xin's wrongdoings one by one. Xin Xin feels a strong sense of defeat. (PG)Hugo私下劝欣欣不要错过和丽娥相处的日子，免得日后后悔。欣欣恍然Hugo曾照料过失智母亲，顿时觉得和Hugo拉近了距离。美芳义正词严数落欣欣, 一一列出欣欣的罪状。欣欣顿感挫败，难以招架……。.

programme.title: 我是媒体人 Beyond The Cameras - EP 9
天空渐渐亮 Daybreak - EP 1
programme.desc: Zhang Tianliang and Zheng Weilong have been close friends since secondary school. Both of them often get themselves into trouble, and ended up being suspended from school. They were forced to be loanshark runners due to the debt Weilong owed, little did they know in the process, they indirectly caused the death of one of the debtor's wife, Wan An's mother, thus causing Wan An to bear a grudge against loanshark runners. (PG-些许暴力画面)张天亮和郑伟龙从中学起就是好友，两人经常打架闹事，被学校开除。因伟龙欠下大耳窿的钱，两人被迫当上跑腿，间接害死了一名欠债人的妻子，也就是婉安的母亲，但天亮却毫不知情，婉安因此对大耳窿跑腿深恶痛绝。天亮为帮一女子温书莹，犯下严重伤人罪，被判坐牢。出狱后他重新做人，当上律师。.

programme.title: 诡探 Detective Psycho - EP 30
programme.desc: Ba-ye is killed by Hanzhong when he refuses to hand over the seal to Hanzhong. Hanzhong tries to make Zhiquan the scapegoat. Zhiquan's son finally regains consciousness, but Zhiquan has to flee the city to avoid being arrested by the police. (PG13-部分画面令人不安)(大结局)八爷不肯把玉玺交给汉忠结果惹来杀身之祸。汉忠把八爷的死嫁祸给至全。至全终于盼到儿子苏醒，却因为必须跑路而再次离开儿子的身边。.

programme.title: 烈火如歌 The Flame's Daughter - EP 52
programme.desc: Ruge learns about the past lives of her and Yinxue. She hurries to Pinhua Brothel where she reunites with Yinxue. (PG-些许暴力画面)(大结局)烈如歌在幻境中与银雪重逢，如歌梦到银雪百年前的记忆，得知两人的前世。如歌赶去品花楼与银雪重逢，从此不弃不离。.

programme.title: 新方世玉 Hero Of The Times - EP 4
真的不一样 Fake It So Real - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) House bird nest is nest built in a man-made swiftlet house. Cave bird nest is nest built in the mountain caves or on cliffs. In this episode, Lee Teng will show audience what is bird nest, the harvesting process of house bird nests and cave bird nests in Malaysia and the difference between the two. (重)屋燕，是燕子在人工建造的燕屋内筑的巢。洞燕，是燕子在深山岩洞或悬崖峭壁筑的窝。在这一集节目里，李腾先带领观众认识什么是燕窝，接着前往马来西亚，深入了解屋燕和洞燕的采集过程，探讨这两种燕窝的不同之处。.

programme.title: 甘味人生 Taste Of Life - EP 0077 & 0078
programme.desc: (R) Zhao Ju Cai and his wife Li Jin Xiu have five children. Devoted all his life to developing soy sauce products, much as Zhao Ju Cai hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father's pursuit of invention, the Zhao brothers' lives are about to change. (PG)(重)赵居财，一生致力研发酱油产品，与妻李锦琇育有五个孩子；居财虽然希望众孩子之中有人接手经營家业，但也尊重孩子们的兴趣和志向。赵家兄弟也因为父亲赵居财的「发明梦」，人生逐渐起了变化。.

programme.title: 翻乡找味 Taste Of Nanyang - EP 1
programme.desc: The hosts of "Taste of Nanyang" will lead four contestants from different clan to participate in the program. This episode focuses on the culture and cuisine of Teochew. The celebrity chef will demonstrate a dish "Braised Pork Ribs with Pu Ning Bean Paste". Contestants must answer four questions in exchange for the required ingredients. Then they reproduce the dish on the spot. The winners will proceed to the semi-final to continue the challenge. 《翻乡找味》的主持人，将连同四位来自会馆的代表，带领大家寻根作乐。深入浅出、轻轻松松了解认识新加坡各个籍贯的特色和文化。这一集重点介绍潮州的戏曲文化、陈旭年宅第一栋新加坡文化保留遗产和寻找失传的潮州小吃。名厨Chef Daniel将示范《普宁豆酱焖排骨》的做法，参赛者必须回答四道问题，以便换取所需的食材，照原版烹调，最后成功虏获名厨味蕾的参赛者，晋级到半决赛，继续接受挑战。.

programme.title: 最家选择 No Place Like Home - EP 1
programme.desc: Young couples on the verge of marriage often have one major concern on their minds - a new flat. And they should. It's an important step but just how do they go about making that decision on the type of flat to buy? Is it really as simple as choosing between a BTO flat or a resale flat? Or do Ben and Chloe - an engaged couple, have many many other variables to take into account? 正要结婚的新婚夫妇，必然会面对买房子的问题。到底该买一间BTO，还是买一间转售组屋呢？要买多大的房子？要住在那里？一连串的疑问，总会在脑海里浮现，挥之不去。就像这一集的Ben和Chloe一样，他们已经订婚了，并准备买一间房子。但和许多正要结婚的夫妇一样，他们发现还有许多因素他们必须考量。.

programme.desc: Wan An is a new prosecutor in the office, dating Judge Wu Renxing who is currently filing for divorce with wife, Chu Lin. Wan An was publicly insulted as a third party by Chu Lin. programme.title: 118 II 118 S2 - EP 12
programme.desc: Daming rejects taking Manman as his god-daughter, angering Jinlong who thinks Daming is looking down on them. Meimei disagrees and feels that Daming must have his reasons. Jinlong reveals that he is ill and does not have long to live; his only worry is that his daughter is being entrusted to trustworthy, honest people instead of being a gangster. 达明拒绝收慢慢为干女儿，金龙大怒，指达明等人狗眼看人低。媚媚表示并非看不起他们父女，而是不知金龙的居心。金龙这才说出自己得了绝症，命不长久，因担心唯一的女儿在黑道中打滚，希望把她托付给值得信赖的人。.

programme.title: 哆啦A梦 New Doraemon - EP 46
programme.desc: Bew season of Doraemon. 在这系列卡通动画里，小朋友们将看到哆啦A梦 - 这只来自未来世界的机器猫，如何应用它的法宝，协助其主人大雄解决生活上的各种难题。.

programme.title: 三生三世十里桃花 Eternal Love - EP 22
programme.desc: With the help of LIjing and the topographic map provided by Baiqian's fourth brother, Baizhen, Yehua leads the army against the rebels in the far north and wins the battle. 离镜帮助夜华再加上白真上神的北荒地形一起平定北荒。北荒战乱终于平定，夜华等人得胜归朝。.

programme.title: 边缘父子 On The Fringe 11 - EP 14
programme.desc: Casts:Li Nan Xing as Tian Yi Bang;Fann Wong as Liu Jia Li;Rui En as Sha Sha;Zhang Yao Dong as Leo 演员：李南星饰田一邦;范文芳饰刘佳丽;瑞恩饰莎莎;张耀栋饰Leo.

programme.title: 甘味人生 Taste Of Life - EP 247
programme.desc: Zhao Ju Cai and his wife Li Jin Xiu have five children. Devoted all his life to developing soy sauce products, much as Zhao Ju Cai hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father's pursuit of invention, the Zhao brothers' lives are about to change 赵居财，一生致力研发酱油产品，与妻李锦琇育有五个孩子；居财虽然希望众孩子之中有人接手经營家业，但也尊重孩子们的兴趣和志向。赵家兄弟也因为父亲赵居财的「发明梦」，人生逐渐起了变化。.

programme.title: 229明天见 29th February - EP 20
programme.desc: Zheng Fang and the rest attempt to look for Mr Zhu in the hopes of finding a way back to the real world. They go to the painting shop only to find the door locked. Mr Zhu is not working that day. Zheng Fang and Zhi Xin have no choice but to try to find their own way to return. They suddenly recall the terrorist attack that would occur on that day and find ways to prevent it. However, in order to save someone, Zheng Fang sacrifices himself... （大结局）正方等人找朱老板寻求回去之法，却见画店大门深锁，朱老板竟然休假。正方和知新只好自己尝试回去，却想起恐怖袭击一事，决定去阻止。不料正方为了救人，却牺牲了自己…正方是否能安然无恙，回到现实世界与家人团聚？.

programme.title: 狮城有约 Hello Singapore - EP 17
programme.desc: (Live) Delivering the day's latest news and social features that matter to you. Every Monday to Friday, from 6.30pm to 7.30pm on Channel 8. （现场直播）总结一天大小事，关心属于你我的家园。每逢星期一至五，傍晚6.30-7.30pm，与你相约！.

programme.title: 老友万岁 Old Is Gold - EP 106
programme.desc: Sha Sha stumbles upon the video of Sean acting suspiciously on the day of the event and begins to investigate privately. To defend himself, Sean frames Sha Sha by tampering with Zhong Xin's meals, causing Zhong Xin to be hospitalised, Mei Fang makes use of this chance to force Sha Sha to resign. Xin Xin feels insignificant due to her low position, Li E takes advantage of the situation to convince Xin Xin to develop her relationship with Hugo, and leave the Centenarian Home. 莎莎意外看见Sean在活动当天鬼祟的视频，开始私下调查。Sean为了自保，陷害莎莎在忠信的食物动手脚，导致忠信入院，美芳趁机逼莎莎辞职。欣欣有感人微言轻，丽娥趁机说服她和Hugo发展，离开千岁之家。.

programme.title: 午餐吃什么 (60 min) What's For Lunch? - EP 4
programme.desc: What's for lunch? Celebrity couple Darren Lim and Evelyn Tan meets up with the hosts at People's Park Hawker Centre in Chinatown. Darren shares his love for Hainan noodles here. Just what is it about this dish that he is such a big fan of? What other dishes are Darren and Evelyn recommending? And what are couple busy with these days?Next up, we meet the 3 hunks, Tosh, Joshua and Maxi at their favourite Japanese restaurant in Bugis!... “午餐吃什么？”模范夫妻林明伦和陈毓芸带大家来到了牛车水的珍珠坊熟食中心，这里有明伦推荐的海南抱罗粉，到底是什么味道让明伦想推荐给大家？还有什么必吃的美食呢？夫妻俩最近又在忙什么呢？下半场有三位电影型男Tosh、Joshua和Maxi推荐位于武吉士的日本餐馆。他们爱吃什么日本料理呢？有哪些食物是必点的？三位男嘉宾目前有什么计划呢？节目精彩，不要错过！.

programme.title: 天空渐渐亮 Daybreak - EP 3
programme.desc: Zhang Tianliang and Zheng Weilong have been close friends since secondary school. Both of them often get themselves into trouble, and ended up being suspended from school. They were forced to be loanshark runners due to the debt Weilong owed, little did they know in the process, they indirectly caused the death of one of the debtor's wife, Wan An's mother, thus causing Wan An to bear a grudge against loanshark runners. 张天亮和郑伟龙从中学起就是好友，两人经常打架闹事，被学校开除。因伟龙欠下大耳窿的钱，两人被迫当上跑腿，间接害死了一名欠债人的妻子，也就是婉安的母亲，但天亮却毫不知情，婉安因此对大耳窿跑腿深恶痛绝。天亮为帮一女子温书莹，犯下严重伤人罪，被判坐牢。出狱后他重新做人，当上律师。.

programme.title: 晚间新闻 News Tonight - EP 22
programme.desc: Daily evening updates on top local news and world news. 《晚间新闻》每日为您提供最全面的本地与全球新闻报道。.

programme.title: 寻花探草 Sr 5 Garden Of Treasure Sr 5 - EP 9
programme.desc: Hosted by Zhuan Wenjie; season 5 returns with a story on how a farmer interacts with nature. A group of herbalists also teaches you how to make unique herbal soaps as you rediscover traditional herbs. 主持人庄文杰带大家逃离忙碌生活，寻访有故事的农人，看看他们 如何亲手打造一片农田，过着最与世无争的农家生活。.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 12
programme.desc: (R) Yunxue brings the drunken Wulie to his house and intentionally rings the doorbell to let Haizhu sees her face. Her aim is to induce their marriage breakdown. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)金武烈喝得醉醺醺,尹雪将他送回家，到家门口时海珠打来电话，尹雪故意接通视频电话让海珠看到自己。目的是让他们两婚姻破裂。.

programme.title: 离家。出走 Greener Pastures - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) Today, there are more than 20 million refugees worldwide who are forced to seek temporary shelter in different countries. In Malaysia alone, there are more than 90,000 refugees living in Selangor and Kuala Lumpur. Life is hard, despite their best efforts to eke out an existence in a foreign land. (重)由于战乱和冲突，每天有将近3万人逃离家园，沦为难民。如今，全球共有超过两千万难民。他们被迫在不同的国境中漂泊、离散，无处安身。在马来西亚，仅仅在雪兰莪和吉隆坡地区，就有超过9万名难民。他们在离家很远的地方，用加倍的努力，去抵御生活中的百般滋味。.

programme.title: 探索食材 The Food Detectives 3 - EP 13
programme.desc: (R) The new season of "The Food Detectives" continues the culinary exploration of the foods we eat and more. Host Nikki Muller, will debunk the myths, delve into the unknowns and provide useful information to help us make informed choices for the meals we enjoy and how they fit into our lifestyles. (重)(双声道-中/英).

programme.title: 寂寞鱼•听见 A Lonely Fish - EP 6
programme.desc: Jing Xuan suspects Tim is the mastermind behind the car accident and confronts him with the group photograph and cassette tape that she found. Tim denies that he has anything to do with the accident, he tells Jing Xuan that there might not be any mastermind. Jing Xuan is confused as she does not know if she should believe Tim. Kora explains to Jing Xuan that she treats Yi Kai like a brother and she will never let Jing Xuan down, the two good friends reconcile and look for Jing Xuan's classmate Jian Yu, who is editing their short film. Kora accidentally finds out that Jian Yu had been stalking Jing Xuan and taking photos of her secretly. Jing Xuan found out that Ann's assistant was following Hao Cheng and her from these photos. Jing Xuan suspects Ann is associated with the car accident. Jing Xuan confronts Ann about the car accident. Ann brings Jing Xuan back to the scene of the accident and says, if Jing Xuan wants to know the truth, she will have to pay a heavy price, including losing (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(大结局)静萱拿着父母、Tim和Ann四人的合照和卡带去找Tim。她怀疑Tim是策划车祸的幕后黑手。Tim告诉静萱自己没有设计那场车祸，也许车祸根本就没有幕后黑手。静萱不知道该不该相信Tim。Kora向静萱解释自己与亦凯的感觉后，两人和好如初。两人一起去找建宇，看他剪辑的片段。Kora意外发现建宇一直都在偷拍静萱。静萱从建宇的偷拍照片中发现了Ann的助理曾经跟踪过她和浩成，静萱怀疑Ann与车祸有关。静萱去找Ann问清真相。Ann带静萱回到车祸现场，告诉静萱如果她要知道车祸的真相，她就要付出很大的代价，静萱将失去现在所拥有的一切，包括她的甜蜜爱情。时亦凯出现，在旁劝静萱不要为了寻找真相，而失去他们之间的感情。静萱十分挣扎，她真的很想知道车祸背后的真相，想为爸妈讨回公道。在爱情和真相之间，静萱选择了…….

programme.title: 我女婿的女人 Marrying My Daughter Twice - EP 66
programme.desc: (R) Meici is in a critical condition when her kidneys fail completely. Zhenshu agrees to donate her kidney immediately. Meici regains consciousness not long after the operation, but Zhenshu remains unconscious for days. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)美慈的肾脏完全失去功能，毒素扩散到身体的其他部分，医生建议立刻动手术。真淑答应。手术过后，美慈苏醒，但真淑却久久没有醒来。.

programme.title: 奇怪的搭档 Love In Trouble - EP 23
programme.desc: (R) Xianxiu manages to escape from the hospital after injuring Youjing and the police officer guarding his ward. Zhixu worries that Xianxiu will harm Fengxi, so he suggests that she move into his house. Fengxi rejects his suggestion. Xianxiu can't do much except ask Fengxi to be careful. (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)(双声道-中/韩)贤秀趁看守着他在病房门口的刑警不备，打伤了他们和前来逮捕他的宥静，成功地逃出了医院。由于担心逃脱的贤秀会对奉熙不利，智旭提议奉熙搬去他的家住，但被奉熙拒绝了。智旭没有法子，只好提醒奉熙要注意安全。.

(PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)韩素拉召开新闻发布会说道治是WID集团分子之一。道英要道治公布对家族事业不感兴趣。海珠对智媛说亲眼看到武烈与如莉接吻，武烈狡辩说并没有这件事，智媛也认为海珠是得了被害妄想症.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 16
programme.desc: (R) Wulie tries to stop Yunxue from going to an interview in the WID Organization, so he purposely gives her a wrong venue. While searching for the room, she saves Daoying from a falling light and is late for the interview. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)金武烈知道尹雪即将来WID公司面试，试图阻止。尹雪去WID集团面试，却碰到道英发生危险, 尹雪立刻上前将其推开,结果她错过了面试。.

programme.title: 梦想的声音 2 Sound Of My Dream 2 - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) Produced by the same people behind Sing!, Sound of My Dream boasts 5 top-notch mentors, (Sandy Lam, JJ Lin, Yu Quan Group, Jane Zhang), impressive sets and production, and a very unique contest format. The contest witnesses the challenges and preparation each mentor puts into their performances as they prove their worth. And it features stellar performances from mentors and amateurs alike. (重)本季四组常驻导师为羽泉、林忆莲、林俊杰和张靓颖，主持人为华少。另从本季开始新设立客座导师一位，称之为“神秘导师”，每期更换。第二季在选歌方式与上季不同，选歌、定歌都在录影前，练歌则是在录影前6小时之内完成（上季只有3小时，这季增加音樂導師练歌时间）；6小时后在舞台将直接接受追梦歌手讨教。.

programme.title: Wasabi 新体验 Find The Wasabi 2 - EP 7
programme.desc: (R) "Find the Wasabi 2" is a 'reality-game travelogue' series featuring 3 Asian celebrities who are on a special mission to find the 'secret spice' of Japan... In each episode, the Hunters are challenged by a powerful "Commander" to solve 'mysteries' about Japan that puzzle people around the world. (重)WASABI新体验第二季再出击，徐鸣杰将与来自泰国及马来西亚的朋友在日本学习当忍者，通过不同的任务竞赛，探索不为人知的日本文化，带给你潮流、美食、旅游等第一手资料，发现日本新魅力！这一系列的Wasabi主持人是性感女神藤原纪香。.

programme.title: 大话精 True Lies - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) Aidan wants to confess his feelings for Nadia but ends up embarrassing himself. Aidan finds out that Shi Jie keeps bullying Nadia and lies to teach Shi Jie a lesson. It turns out that when Aidan was young, he also often stood up for Nadia to bullies and helped her out of situations. But Nadia has scolded him for his help and has even chased him away, exclaiming that she hates him, on several occasions. Aidan has never understood why, which is why he has taken on the name of Aidan and tries to get closer to Nadia. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)Aidan想对Nadia献殷勤，结果反而出糗，尴尬不已。Aidan发现施姐一再欺负Nadia，为Nadia出气，撒谎整施姐。原来小时候的赵毅刚（Aidan），也常为被人欺负的林美玲（Nadia）出气，但林美玲总是一次又一次的轰走帮助自己的毅刚，更扬言讨厌他！毅刚百思不解，为此他决定改名Aidan，亲近Nadia。.

programme.title: 线人 3 Fixer 3 - EP 10
programme.desc: (R) Seeking social status equality is the women's goal in Iran as feminism is forcibly discredited in the society. Role transformation is their indicator as they are no longer satisfied with being just a wife and mother and have made relevant effort within limits to regain or change their social status. (重)在女权主义被强行抹黑的伊朗社会，地位平等是伊朗女性努力寻求的目标，妇女角色的转型是风向标，她们不再满足于只是作为妻子和母亲的角色。伊朗妇女为重获或改变自己的社会地位，在允许的条件内作出了相应的努力。.

programme.title: 爷爷的路 My Grandfather's Road - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) My Grandfather's Road aims to uncover even more roads in Singapore named after notable founding fathers and pioneers through their descendants. Through in-depth interviews, archive footages and show and tells, we will learn more about the country's past as well as the people who helped make Singapore the success that it is today. (重)《爷爷的路》的目的是发现更多以开国元勋和先锋而命名的马路。通过深入采访他们的子孙后裔、录像档案、演出和口述，让我们对国家的历史以及建国功臣们有更加深入的了解。.

programme.title: 守护家族 (Dual Sound) Save The Family - EP 35
programme.desc: (R) Shimei and Shihao's father suddenly appears to demand for the income they received for appearing in the advertisement. He turns violent when Shimei and Shihao refuse to give him the money. Haixiu is knocked unconscious when she tries to protect Yuzhen from being beaten by Shimei's father. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)世美和世浩的父亲突然出现，表面上是要与他们团聚，实际上是觊觎他们的广告费。世美和世浩不肯给父亲钱，父亲大声吵闹，还对劝架的宇真挥拳。海秀为了保护宇真，自己被撞晕。.

programme.title: 守护家族 (Dual Sound) Save The Family - EP 36
programme.desc: (R) Guixi says she does not agree to the relationship between Yuzhen and Yiyuan as Wancai is just a security guard. Wancai retaliates by saying that he also does not want to have anything to do with Guixi as she is rude and snobbish. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)贵熙说ONE’s食品的职员们都知道万才是公司大楼的警卫，非常丢脸，没办法跟郑家做亲家。万才指贵熙对他的家人无礼，又拿钱伤害他们，令他也一样不想跟高家做亲家。.

programme.title: 黑骑士 Black Knight - EP 20
programme.desc: (R) Sharon is dealt with a blow when she hears that Xiuhao has proposed to Haila. Bai Xi tells Sharon to make a wedding gown for Haila, but the latter refuses. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)雪伦从海拉姨妈的口中得知秀浩向海拉求婚，大受打击。白熙告诉要雪伦为海拉准备婚纱，但雪伦拒绝那么做。.

programme.title: 黑骑士 Black Knight - EP 21
programme.desc: (R) Xiuhao suffers severe headache and seeks Bai Xi's help. She reveals his past life's entanglements with Sharon and Haila. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/韩)秀浩经常感到头疼。他向白熙请教，从而得知自己前世和海拉与雪伦有着爱恨纠缠的关系。.

programme.title: 最强大脑之燃烧吧大脑 第二季 Puzzle Masters S2 - EP 6
programme.desc: Hosted by Jiang Changjian, "Puzzle Masters Season 2" is a reality-cum-variety programme that showcases individuals with extraordinary brainpower. Wang Feng, Wei Kunlin and Bao Yun serve as team leaders. Qi Wei, Han Xue and Amber Kuo are the guests of the programme. 《最强大脑之燃烧吧大脑第二季》邀具备非凡脑力的天才上节目进行各项挑战，并以科学的方式分析各高手的能力。节目由蒋昌建主持，王峰、魏坤琳、鲍橒担任队长，戚薇、韩雪、郭采洁三位女嘉宾倾情加盟。.

programme.title: 我的契约老公吴先生 My Contracted Husband, Mr Oh - EP 31
programme.desc: Noticing Zuodou's expression when he is fixing Enzhao's gayageum, Shengzhu realizes that Zuodou prefers to return to the countryside to make gayageum. She suggests to Zuodou to return to the countryside as she worries Zuodou will not be happy in Seoul. She proposes they can maintain a long-distance courtship, with face to face meetings twice a week and calls twice daily. However, Shengzhu is too busy and often cannot fulfil the commitment. This disappoints Zuodou many times. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)胜珠见作斗替恩照修琴的表情，知道他还是喜欢回乡下做琴。因担心他为了自己留在首尔会不幸福，于是胜珠提议让作斗回乡下，和自己远距离恋爱，两人每周见面一次，每天打电话两次。但胜珠因工作太忙，常常无法照做，让作斗失望多次。.

programme.title: 我的契约老公吴先生 My Contracted Husband, Mr Oh - EP 32
programme.desc: Shengzhu's good friends knows that Shengzhu has decided to move to the countryside to live with Zuodou. All of them find her courageous. Zuodou knows Shengzhu has a tough time working in Seoul. He confesses his love to Shengzhu and they decide to get married. They have a warm wedding in the countryside which all their good friends attend. Shengzhu's mother and brother knows she is very happy when they see her joyful expression. (PG)(大结局)(双声道-中/韩)好友们知胜珠决定到乡下和作斗生活，都觉得她很有勇气。作斗知胜珠在首尔工作辛苦。他向胜珠告白，俩人决定结婚。他们在乡下办了一场温馨的婚礼，众好友们都来参加了。胜珠的母亲和弟弟见到胜珠开心的表情，知道她很幸福。.

programme.title: 儿子的战争 Remember - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) Zhenyu capably wins the first trial. Renya feels doubt after seeing Zhenya vindicating the vice president of the Rihao Group. Renya speaks frankly to Zhenya after having some drinks. Zhenyu is very touched when he finds out the reason for Renya to become a prosecutor is to clear his father's name. (PG-些许性相关语)(重)(双声道-中/韩)振宇凭借出色的能力取得一审胜利，仁雅见他帮日浩集团副社长脱罪心存疑惑。仁雅醉酒后向振宇坦白心声，振宇得知仁雅成为检察官是为了替父亲翻案大受感动。.

programme.title: 异口同声 Who Is The Real Singer - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) Hosted by Chen Huan, Pop stars and impersonators face off to be the last one standing as the panel of singing judges try to determine the real singer by listening to their voices only. (重)由陈欢主持《异口同声》是一个大型猜评推理音乐节目，由陈欢主持。节目邀请乐坛代表性歌手讲述金曲背后故事，同时邀请模唱歌手用他们以假乱真的声线向专业猜评团发起挑战。专业猜评团由张宇、黄国伦、刘维、魏巡、马松、冯提莫组成。.

programme.title: 美食世家 2 Food Empire 2 - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) Breakfast is, surely, the most important meal of the day. And Singapore has an inexhaustible list of breakfast items for early risers! Episode One hunts down 3 local favourites to kickstart the day! Let's rouse over butter cakes dunked in steaming coffee, scrumptious nasi lemak and flying pratas!

programme.title: 笔墨间的飨宴 A Literary Feast - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) Be it comfort food found in comics or the nostalgic taste of old Tokyo, the underlying spirit of these dishes are vividly personified in renowned Japanese literature. Host Youyi travels to Japan to have a taste of the dishes from classical and contemporary Japanese culture. (重)无论是漫画中传递温情的平凡菜肴，迎合都市快捷生活节奏的轻食，还是勾起回忆的浓浓古早味，日本历代文豪以精湛的文笔，捕捉食物的情意；借由笔墨让料理醇厚的味道持久留芳。这一集，主持人有懿透过味蕾，感受日式料理中蕴含的新旧文化。.

programme.title: 寻找原之味 Food Old Days - EP 10
programme.desc: (R) Singapore is heralded as the Food Paradise and Singaporeans' favourite pastime includes searching out for the best hawker and local cuisines in every corner on the island. However, many traditional food fares are now on the brink of vanishing. Many of these stall owners are either old or retiring and found no one to succeed their businesses even though they may be thriving. (重)新加坡号称美食天堂，新加坡人最喜爱的休闲活动之一就是全岛搜寻最好吃的熟食档、到全岛各角落品尝本地美食。然而，随着时代进步、空间变迁，许多传统美食因为后继无人而渐渐消失，许多传统做法因为科技而渐渐失传。.

programme.title: 寻医 A Medical Journey - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) In the Philippines, 3 babies are born per minute. Manila is now the world's most densely populated city and home to a 'baby factory hospital'. Joanna Dong enters the delivery wards to uncover unsettling issues - high teenage pregnancy rates and poor families burdened by too many mouths to feed. (重)在菲律宾每三分钟就有一名宝宝诞生。首都马尼拉目前已是全球人口最稠密的城市，政府妇幼医院更成为举世闻名的“婴孩工厂”。董姿彦发现，不节育、孩子生得过多，不但加重了医疗资源短缺，也延续了贫困的恶性循环。.

programme.title: 守护家族 (Dual Sound) Save The Family - EP 37
programme.desc: (R) Yuzhen does not want his family to be humiliated by the Gaos anymore. He rejects the promotion in the hospital and also initiates a break-up with Yiyuan. Yiyuan has a falling-out with Guixi as she blames Guixi for affecting her relationship with Yuzhen. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)宇真不愿意父母一直对艺苑的家人低头，终于决定拒绝担任医院的外科主任，也向艺苑提出分手。艺苑怪贵熙导致她和宇真分手，警告贵熙别再插手她的人生，也别觊觎公司。两母女闹翻。.

programme.title: 守护家族 (Dual Sound) Save The Family - EP 38
programme.desc: (R) While initially biased against Xizhen, Zhengshu changes her views about her when Xizhen impresses with her decorum. Yuzhen and Haixiu do volunteer work at a village. Yuzhen saves Haixiu when she almost drowns. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)政淑约见熙真。熙真的谈吐及为允灿说尽好话的一面令政淑对熙真刮目相看。宇真和海秀一起到农村去做义工。海秀为了救一名小孩，险些溺水，幸好宇真及时把她从水里救起。.

programme.title: 黑骑士 Black Knight - EP 22
programme.desc: (R) Sharon stabs Xiuhao when she is disappointed with his attitude towards her. Xiuhua sinks into a coma and recalls encounters with Haila in their past lives. (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)(双声道-中/韩)秀浩彻底失望的雪伦一刀刺伤了他。昏迷中的秀浩，想起自己和海拉前世的画面。.

programme.title: 黑骑士 Black Knight - EP 23
programme.desc: (R) Xiuhao discovers a change in his body when he wakes up from his coma. Meanwhile, Sharon attempts suicide while on his way to the police station. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/韩)秀浩清醒后发现自己体内的力量产生变化。雪伦在前往警察局的途中企图自杀。.

programme.title: 梦想的声音 3 Sound Of My Dream S3 - EP 11
programme.desc: A music variety where a number of talented singers, amateur or otherwise are given the chance to "challenge" a celebrity tutor by singing one of the celebrity's songs. In exchange, the celebrity is assigned one of four randomly selected songs and has three hours to come up with a cover performance of this song. 与上季相同，基本模式为星素挑战，由追梦歌手对导师发起讨教（挑战）。但在第三季开始，选歌模式已经更换为第一季的模式，可是选择权是由参赛者说“开始”的时候，只要喊“停”，那一首歌曲就是讨教老师要唱的歌。和第一季不一样的是，每一首歌都有关键词。如果进行第二轮讨教，是没有任何的关键词。时间也从之前的6个小时改成3个小时。据华少声称，如果“惊”曲榜里的歌曲原唱者是导师的话，讨教歌手若是选择原唱者导师，将会带来的难度和风险更大，最终导致讨教失败。这一季的歌手包括林俊杰，王嘉尔，胡彦斌，张靓颖，谭维维 等。.

programme.title: 我身后的陶斯 My Secret, Terrius - EP 1
programme.desc: Ailin is the mother of a pair of twins. She is normally busy taking care of her mischievous son and daughter. One day, her mischievous daughter accidentally knocks into her mysterious neighbour, Jin Ben, and they start to interact. Jin Ben grows curious about the mother who oddly knows much about his life and he keeps bumping into her whenever he goes out... (PG)(首播)(双声道-中/韩)爱麟是双胞胎妈妈，平日为了照顾一对淘气的儿女而忙碌。这天，因淘气儿女捣蛋的关系，不小心撞伤了住在隔壁的神秘新邻居金本，开始打交道。金本发现这位妈妈莫名其妙地相当了解他的生活，出门时又经常碰到她，开始对这位邻居感到十分好奇。。。。。。.

programme.title: 我身后的陶斯 My Secret, Terrius - EP 2
programme.desc: Jin Ben goes to a wake to investigate the death of Wen Chengzhu, who was the head of the National Security Department. He gets discovered by the NIS deputy director Quan Yingshi. Quan Yingshi recognises Jin Ben as the ex-agent code named "Terrius" and orders his men to hunt down Jin Ben. Jin Ben quickly shakes them off. While handling her husband's funeral arrangements, Ailin receives a call from her neighbour informing her that her twins have disappeared. She is in panics. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)金本到灵堂去调查国家保安室室长文成洙的死因时，不慎被国家情报院次长权英实发现了踪迹。权英实认出来金本就是代号为“陶斯”的前特工后命人,即刻加以追捕。金本遭到追踪，迅速逃跑。正当爱麟在办老公的后事时，接到邻居来电告知双胞胎失踪的消息，不禁陷入了恐慌之中。.

(重)与上季相同，基本模式为星素挑战，由追梦歌手对导师发起讨教（挑战）。但在第三季开始，选歌模式已经更换为第一季的模式，可是选择权是由参赛者说“开始”的时候，只要喊“停”，那一首歌曲就是讨教老师要唱的歌。和第一季不一样的是，每一首歌都有关键词。如果进行第二轮讨教，是没有任何的关键词。时间也从之前的6个小时改成3个小时。据华少声称，如果“惊”曲榜里的歌曲原唱者是导师的话，讨教歌手若是选择原唱者导师，将会带来的难度和风险更大，最终导致讨教失败。这一季的歌手包括林俊杰，王嘉尔，胡彦斌，张靓颖，谭维维 等。.

programme.title: 儿子的战争 Remember - EP 9
programme.desc: (R) Renya visits Zhenyu's newly opened law firm to congratulate him. Zhenyu tells her that he has applied for the retrial of Zaihe's case. (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)(双声道-中/韩)仁雅特地前来祝贺振宇的律师事务所开业。振宇向她表示已经申请四年前父亲载赫被冤枉的案子再审。因为有证人能证明父亲当初不在场，振宇相信这次会证明父亲是无罪的。.

programme.desc: For the third challenge, they had to make Chendol. Fugui knew that Meiwei was very good at making Chendol and Tai Long would be of no match for her. Little did he know that Meiwei deliberately performed under her standards to lose to Tai Long, who also coincidentally made bad Chendol. 三个年轻人即将得到老字号南洋风味小吃店价值一百万的Laksa祖传秘方。他们是风雨同舟的兄弟：商业奇才庄浩伦（包勋评饰）、刀神陈欧文（方伟杰饰）和烹饪天才何泰龙（冯伟衷饰），合称“H.O.T”。三个前科犯准备接管生意，创造更好的生活。他们将遇到为厨师梦而孤军奋战的曾美薇（雅慧饰）、扬言破坏他们声誉的大厨Gordon（George Young饰）和破坏弟弟泰龙幸福的泰虎（李腾饰）。H.O.T之间的忠诚和成功将会因为过去的阴影而再次接受挑战。.

programme.title: 线人2 Fixer 2 - EP 7
programme.desc: Fortune is everywhere in Raub of Pahang, Malaysia and everyone is a millionaire there. The economic benfits are brought about by the Mao Shan Wang durians and durian farm owners in Sungai Klau have admitted that they have hit the jackpot. How can durian indulgence develop into a national industry? 马来西亚彭亨州的劳勿县仿佛遍地黄金，拿块石头随便丢，都可以砸到一个百万富翁。说的是榴梿猫山王带来的经济效益。双溪吉流的榴梿园主都自认押对了宝，吃榴梿从纯味蕾享受发展至国民产业，到底是怎样的一番风雨路？.

programme.desc: Ep 70: Bafeng finds Zaiyong's memory card in the office. Jia-en leads Bafeng to reveal where he has kept the memory card when Bafeng is drunk. Ep 70: 八峰在办公室里找一张记忆卡，发现是载永撞倒宋院长的，于是拿着记忆卡威胁载永。佳恩灌醉八峰，诱导他说出记忆卡藏在哪里。佳恩本来希望用记忆卡交换贤泰的感情，但贤泰拒绝跟她发展婚外情。佳恩于是投向载永。.

They start fighting and Bong-soon ends up being arrested. 都奉顺路过工地，看到了工地上的工人在殴打一个开幼儿园校车的司机，为了帮助年迈的司机，她拿出了手机报警，想要阻止这场暴行。另一个工人抓住奉顺的手机把它扔在地板上。双方开打，奉顺被捉到警察局。.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 22
programme.desc: Wulie learns about Yunxue's allergy to seafood and her admission to hospital and deduces that Yunxue is Ruli. Yunxue lies to him that Ruli is her lost twin sister. Wulie is confused. programme.title: 花遊記 A Korean Odyssey - EP 16
